home.rightCardContent_1: We provide professional maintenance, part replacement, diagnostics, and repairs:
home.leftCardContent_1: to our service station in Krakow! We offer high-quality maintenance and repair services for cars of all brands.
home.leftCardContent_2: Our experienced mechanics and specialists are ready to help you with any car-related problems.
home.middleCardContent_1: Located in the heart of Krakow with convenient transport access.
home.aboutContent_1: We provide professional maintenance, part replacement, engine diagnostics and repair, brake systems, suspension, and many other car components. We work quickly, efficiently, and at affordable prices.
aboutAdvantages: Transparent repair process. Upon request, we provide video and photo reports of completed work.
We stick to deadlines and understand you need your car back as soon as possible.
We only repair what’s necessary, no extra charges or unnecessary repairs.
Official warranty on repairs for up to 1 year.

customerServices.unitsReplacementDescriptionShort: Regular maintenance and timely replacement of worn components help avoid major breakdowns and expensive repairs.

diagnosis.title: Vehicle System Diagnostics
diagnosis.descriptionShort: Comprehensive service focused on assessing the technical condition of the vehicle.
diagnosis.description_1: Modern vehicles feature numerous complex systems, each requiring regular monitoring and maintenance to ensure safety and reliability.{newLine}The main goal of diagnostics is to identify faults and prevent potential problems. Our station checks all key vehicle systems: engine, brakes, suspension, steering, electrical systems, safety systems, and exhaust system. Specialized equipment and software provide mechanics with precise data about each system’s condition.

options.name: Engine Diagnostics
options.description: Engine diagnostics include checking its performance in various modes, measuring compression, analyzing exhaust gases, and checking the ignition system. It is important to ensure that all components are working optimally to prevent serious breakdowns.

options.name: Brake System
options.description: The brake system is checked for wear on pads and discs, the condition of the hydraulic system, and braking efficiency. The suspension and steering are diagnosed for wear and damage to ensure safe and comfortable driving.

options.name: Vehicle Electrical System
options.description: Diagnostics of the brake system include checking the battery, alternator, starters, as well as all wires and sensors. Safety systems such as ABS, ESP, and airbags are also thoroughly inspected.

options.name: Exhaust System Diagnostics
options.description: Exhaust system diagnostics are essential not only for the proper functioning of the car but also for compliance with environmental standards. Checking the catalytic converter, lambda sensors, and system tightness helps reduce harmful emissions.

unitsReplacement.title: Replacement of Components and Units
unitsReplacement.descriptionShort: Regular maintenance and timely replacement of worn components help avoid major breakdowns and costly repairs.
unitsReplacement.description_1: Replacing components and units of all vehicle systems is an important service that ensures the longevity and safety of the vehicle. Regular maintenance and timely replacement of worn components help avoid major breakdowns and costly repairs. {newLine} The first and most important unit is the engine. Replacement may be needed in cases of significant wear, cylinder or piston damage. It is also important to replace filters, spark plugs, and drive belts that directly affect engine performance.

options.name: Engine
options.description: Engine replacement may be necessary in cases of significant wear, cylinder or piston damage. It is also important to replace filters, spark plugs, and drive belts that directly affect engine performance.

options.name: Cooling System
options.description: The cooling system requires periodic replacement of the radiator, thermostat, and water pump. These components ensure the optimal operating temperature of the engine, preventing overheating.

options.name: Transmission
options.description: Transmission replacement may involve clutches, gearboxes, or driveshafts. This is necessary for smooth and reliable gear shifting and power transfer to the wheels.

options.name: Brake System
options.description: The brake system requires regular replacement of pads, discs, and brake fluid. The wear of these components directly affects driving safety. It is also important to monitor the condition of brake hoses and cylinders.

options.name: Suspension and Steering
options.description: Suspension and steering require replacement of shock absorbers, springs, ball joints, and tie rod ends. These elements ensure the vehicle's comfort and handling, and their wear can lead to reduced stability and maneuverability.

options.name: Electrical System
options.description: The electrical system includes many components such as the battery, alternator, starter, and various sensors. Their replacement is necessary for the reliable operation of all vehicle systems and prevention of malfunctions.

options.name: Exhaust System
options.description: The exhaust system requires the replacement of the muffler, catalytic converter, and lambda sensors. These components reduce noise and harmful emissions, complying with environmental standards.

unitsRepair.title: Repair of Vehicle Units and Components
unitsRepair.descriptionShort: A critically important service that extends the lifespan of the vehicle and ensures its safe operation.
unitsRepair.description_1: Modern vehicles consist of many complex systems and components, each requiring regular maintenance and, if necessary, repair. Professional repair of vehicle units and components at a service station allows timely detection and elimination of malfunctions, extending the vehicle's lifespan and increasing its reliability on the road.

options.name: Engine Repair
options.description: Engine repair includes replacing worn pistons, cylinders, crankshaft, and other internal components. Regular inspection and repair of the cooling system, including the radiator, thermostat, and water pump, are also necessary to prevent engine overheating.

options.name: Transmission, including gearbox and clutch
options.description: Transmission repair may include replacing gears, bearings, clutch, and oil. These operations are necessary to ensure smooth gear shifting and effective power transfer from the engine to the wheels.

options.name: Brake System
options.description: One of the most critical vehicle components in terms of safety. Brake system repair may include replacing brake pads, discs, cylinders, and fluid. Wear of these components can lead to reduced braking efficiency and increased stopping distance.

options.name: Suspension and Steering
options.description: Replacing shock absorbers, springs, tie rod ends, and ball joints ensures vehicle comfort and handling, as well as prevents premature wear of tires and other components.

options.name: Electrical System
options.description: Includes many components such as the battery, alternator, starter, and various sensors. Repairing the electrical system is necessary to ensure the reliable operation of all vehicle systems, from ignition to lighting and engine control.

options.name: Exhaust System Repair
options.description: Includes replacing the muffler, catalytic converter, and lambda sensors. Helps reduce noise and emissions, complying with environmental standards.

benefitsList.title: Why Choose Our Service
benefitsList.carShare: We provide a car while yours is being repaired
